entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:41 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
